column5: NAR OMG SAME someone who is the worst for you SIGN ME THE FUCK UP 😂😂😂

It’s different for everyone and depends on where u live how people see it but as I’ve had friends google my condition and generally been worried about that’s how I live my life

Idk if this is the case but he has told about causes such as university’s jobs and I’ve heard one story of someone with bpd going into the hospital with a broken leg and they wanted to have them sectioned because they were worried about the person for no obvious reason as the break was due to something random or unrelated I believe so is just about being extra careful and making sure they fully understand the condition because of an employer has no idea about bpd and Google’s it the information about people with bpd is displayed in a negative way and that may personally affect their opinion on you

Personal I recommend going private if that’s an option my psychologist explained about the massive stigma with BPD in the uk and once it’s on your record it can be seen in a very judgmental way and can affect a lot of things if it not an option going to the GP is probably the best place to start
